content.description: Start to the left of Lightning Bolt on small pockets. Continue up into a large sloping circular-edge. Use edges and pockets once standing on top of the circular shape to top out.
content.location: To the immediate left of Lightning Bolt on the largest ledge in the warm-up area.

content.description: Start on the bottom of the slab and use pockets to scramble to the top. A fun one for kids. Can go either left or right to top out.
content.location: The very last boulder in the Warm-Up area. Closest to the Orchid boulder uphill from the river. You will be able to see the hole-covered short slab from the trail.

content.description: Use deep pockets along the left side of the boulder to work right and top out.
content.location: The small boulder closest to the trail to the left and below Lightning Bolt, Sorcerer's Stone, and Hagrid's Beard. If coming from the Trailside boulder it will be the first on your left.

content.description: Start in the middle of the boulder and use good holds to top out. Short problem.
content.location: Just down the hill from the Orchid boulder next to Slab City.

content.description: Start in the bottom of a large "L" shaped crack and work your way to the top out.
content.location: On the largest face in the warm-up area, down to the left of Slab City and Lumpy. You can see the large "L" shaped crack from the trail.

content.description: Start on edges and pockets to the left of Sorcerer's Stone. Follow the edges up to top out.
content.location: To the left of Lightning Bolt and Sorcerer's Stone on the largest ledge in the warm-up area.

content.description: A collection of ledgey boulders just off of the trail not too far past the Trailside Boulder. They feature lots of pockets and water-formed holds.
